name: Mastermind
description: Masterminds focus on people, using their influence and understanding of secrets to manipulate and control. They excel in intrigue, espionage, and diplomacy, wielding words and secrets as their primary tools.

master_of_intrigue.description: At 3rd level, you gain proficiency with tools and languages to aid in deception and disguise.
mechanics: Gain proficiency with the disguise kit, forgery kit, and one gaming set of your choice.
Learn two languages of your choice.
Can mimic the speech patterns and accent of a creature you've heard speak for at least 1 minute, allowing you to pass as a native speaker if you know the language.

master_of_tactics.description: At 3rd level, you can use your Help action more effectively.
mechanics: Use the Help action as a bonus action.
When you use the Help action to aid an ally in attacking a creature, the target of that attack can be within 30 feet of you, rather than 5 feet, provided the target can see or hear you.

insightful_manipulator.description: At 9th level, you can discern a creature's capabilities compared to your own.
mechanics: Spend at least 1 minute observing or interacting with a creature outside combat to learn if it is your equal, superior, or inferior in two of the following characteristics:
At the DM's discretion, you might also learn a piece of the creature's history or a personality trait.

misdirection.description: Beginning at 13th level, you can redirect an attack meant for you to another creature.
mechanics: When targeted by an attack while a creature within 5 feet of you is granting you cover, you can use your reaction to have the attack target that creature instead of you.

soul_of_deceit.description: At 17th level, your thoughts are shielded from magical probing, and you can present falsehoods as truth.
mechanics: Your thoughts can't be read by telepathy or other means unless you allow it. You can present false thoughts with a Charisma (Deception) check contested by the mind reader's Wisdom (Insight) check.
Magic that would determine if you are telling the truth indicates you are truthful if you choose, and you can't be compelled to tell the truth by magic.
